justification: Recognizes B could swap an injured RB for a healthy workload back, but overlooks B’s appetite for buying low on injuries and their stronger RB depth vs. bigger QB/TE/WR needs. A’s motive (“consolidates talent”) is inaccurate for a 2-for-2 lateral swap. Trade is feasible but not well-aligned with team contexts or B’s upside preference. Rationale is generic and thin on scenario specifics.
